original: Nokilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nokilesaṁ dhammaṁ
paṭicca nanokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nokilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nokileso
ca nanokileso ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
Nanokilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
Nokilesañca nanokilesañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha nava.)
